house_listing.house_description: This home built in 1990 has 2 bedroom(s), 2 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include dining room, master bedroom. Features include view, patio, fire sprinklers, storage space.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Room, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Dining/Living Combo,Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Elevator, Fire Sprinklers, Garage DoorOpener, Great Room, Guest Room, Microwave, Pantry, Storage Space, WetBar
